data.persona: It took me many years to master the skills of archery. Now I am not only a skilled archer, but leader of a team of skilled archers. I am keen-eyed and have a steady hand.
data.description:
You are in the Large cliffs.
Towering cliffs of gray granite line the coast. A few meters of sand lie between the ocean and the base of the cliffs.
The squirrel is here.

You are carrying a quiver and a bow, wearing a tights and a ceremonial hat, and wielding a bow.

data.short_motivation: I must demonstrate how to hunt the squirrel
data.mid_motivation: I have to teach the new recruit on my team how to hunt squirrels
data.long_motivation: We are responsible for providing food for the upcoming feast, and must be able to hunt effectively
